title: UTA Roles for Field Access instead of System Roles
content:
From SmartWiki
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
When selected, the system will derive the user's 
permissions
 to view and edit fields based on the 
UTA role
 that they have on the particular record, as opposed to 
roles
 associated with that user's profile (system roles).
This only works for 
Level 1
, 
Level 2
 and 
Level 3
 
custom fields
, but not 
people
 and 
company
 fields as they are not 
UTA
-based.
